answers.answer: Im 7 weeks n im the same.  Jus eat in moderation
I'm 9 weeks and I'm always complaining I'm hungry even if I've eaten in the last hour lol joys of pregnancy xxxx

Yep that's it the joys of pregnancy I'm 17 weeks 5 days n I'm pretty big for the stage I'm in I've gone from a size 6 to a size 12 my books went from a 12B to 14D n I'm blaming it on the amount of food I ate I've only just started to cut down a bit I think the more food the bigger u get to be honest and alsoI'm not trying to scare u but be careful cause u can get diabetes when u get further along you'll have to do a test to c if u have it I'm keeping my fingers crossed I hope I don't have it I've gained about 7kg but my stomach is just growing it's insane I have stretch marks on my waist my arse and my thighs I think I'm giving birth to a sumo baby
Yes mam thats super normal I'm the same way smh
I am pregnant with twins and its hard not to eat a little of what u fancy xx ;)

question: Hi im about 7weeks and my apperite is through the roof im eating anything and everything. Is anybody else the same.
title: appertite
